item.title: 中国称印度加强边防部队并未缓解紧张局势
item.description: 北京表示，新德里释放 10,000 多名士兵驻扎在双方有争议的边境地区的举动不会缓解紧张局势，但补充说，北京愿意与对手合作以维持和平。【原文：Beijing said New Delhi’s move to free up 10,000 more soldiers to station on their disputed frontier won’t reduce tensions but added that it is willing to work with its rival to keep the peace.】

item.description: 德国 1 月份的工业生产出现了九个月来的首次增长，尽管其长期的疲软很可能已将欧洲最大的经济体拖入衰退。【原文：German industrial production rose in January for the first time in nine months, though its protracted weakness has probably already dragged Europe’s largest economy into a recession.】

item.title: BE称美国薪资集中增长可能掩盖了经济降温
item.description: 据彭博经济报道，美国劳工统计局周五可能会再次发布一份强劲的就业报告，但这份报告显示，2月份的招聘只集中在少数几个行业，掩盖了劳动力市场的广泛降温。【原文：The US Bureau of Labor Statistics will likely issue another strong jobs report Friday, but one that shows hiring in February was concentrated in just a few sectors and masked a broader cooling in the labor market, according to Bloomberg Economics.】

item.title: Signa Prime 从德国家族获得的贷款阻碍了新的融资努力
item.description: 据破产管理人称，Signa 旗舰地产部门的 2 亿欧元（2.18 亿美元）贷款已成为其试图出售资产并为重组提供资金的障碍。【原文：A €200 million ($218 million) loan to Signa’s flagship property unit has become a roadblock in attempts to sell off its assets and fund a restructuring, according to insolvency administrators.】

item.title: 香港将任命前毕马威会计师事务所中国区主管唐嘉信为证券交易所主席
item.description: 香港政府计划任命毕马威会计师事务所（KPMG）中国区前主席唐嘉年（Carlson Tong）主持香港证券交易所的工作。【原文：The Hong Kong government plans to name Carlson Tong, the former chairman of KPMG China, to preside over the city’s stock exchange.】

item.title: 房地产风险促使 S&P 下调对韩国经纪公司的展望
item.description: 据 S&P 全球评级公司称，房地产市场投资可能会给韩国证券公司带来麻烦，该公司周五将两家公司的评级展望调整为负面。【原文：Real estate market investments may cause trouble for South Korean securities firms, according to S&P Global Ratings, which revised its ratings outlook to negative for two companies on Friday.】

item.title: 日本央行加息押注增加，日本大宗商品交易重现生机

item.title: 日经 225 指数面临 2022 年以来日元升值的最大风险
item.description: 根据一项衡量标准，日本股市已成为两年来对日元走势最敏感的股市，这增加了创纪录的股市涨势停滞不前的风险。【原文：Japanese stocks have become the most sensitive to yen moves in two years by one measure, increasing risks of the record equity rally stalling.】

item.title: 拆除路障后香港买家争相抢购房屋
item.description: Ray Yuen 等了几个月，希望有人能买下他在香港的房子，这样他就可以为家人换一套更大的房子。但几乎没有人出价，他收到的出价也低得离谱。【原文：Ray Yuen waited for months for someone to buy his Hong Kong home so he could upgrade to a bigger one for his family. But there were barely any offers, and the ones he received were ridiculously low.】
